AT0002.title: Mobile Phone Emulator
AT0002.description: Also known as a game emulator, it is a simulation program that can emulate an independent mobile phone system on a computer, enabling mobile games to run locally on a PC. Originally designed for player convenience, some features have been exploited by gray/black market actors as accomplices for running cheats. The value modification cheat features in some games rely on the Root permissions provided by the emulator. The multi-instance feature has also been exploited by script studios.

references.title: Game Emulators Become Cheat Accomplices, Gray Market Countermeasures Escalate
